description: Extract the email addresses of all users who have starred the repository from a specific warehouse
github-repository-owner-username-or-orga: GitHub repository owner (username or organization name)
github-personal-access-token-with-read-u: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'read:user' permission
output-file-path-to-save-extracted-email: Output file path to save extracted email addresses (.ndjson format)
enable-resume-functionality-to-continue-: Enable resume functionality to continue from where it left off if interrupted
path-to-the-generated-file-containing-st: Path to the generated file containing stargazer email addresses
converts-an-ndjson-newline-delimited-jso: Converts an NDJSON (Newline Delimited JSON) file to a CSV (Comma-Separated Values) file. Each line in the NDJSON file becomes a row in the CSV with corresponding columns.
path-to-the-input-ndjson-file: Path to the input NDJSON file
output-file-path-for-the-csv-file: Output file path for the CSV file
include-column-headers-in-the-csv-file: Include column headers in the CSV file
path-to-the-generated-csv-file: Path to the generated CSV file
converts-an-ndjson-newline-delimited-jso: Converts an NDJSON (Newline Delimited JSON) file to an Excel spreadsheet. Each line in the NDJSON file becomes a row in the spreadsheet with corresponding columns.
path-to-the-input-ndjson-file2: Path to the input NDJSON file
output-file-path-for-the-excel-file: Output file path for the Excel file
path-to-the-generated-excel-file: Path to the generated Excel file
